data.title: Tom Hardy looks HOT and dusty in snap from Mad Max: Fury Road
data.meta_description: There's a lot of sand and opera in George Miller's post-apocalyptic world
data.text:
Tom Hardy's looking a bit dusty in a new picture from Mad Max: Fury Road.

The actor - who recently exited the Suicide Squad film - looks like a piece of art in the stylised image from the upcoming post-apocalyptic movie.

The whole world recently went mad in the trailer for Mad Max: Fury Road and it looks as if it's right.

In the world of fire and blood, and sand, lots of sand, more sand than seems entirely necessary for even a desert, Tom Hardy is Mad Max, only not as you remember him.

"Out here everything hurts," says an ominous-sounding, shaven-headed Charlize Theron in the trailer.. "You wanna get through this? Do as I say. Now pick up what you can and run."

So he does and it's very sandy. Did we mention there's quite a lot of sand in the post-apocalyptic creation from director George Miller? Because there is.

Here's the 5 things we learned from the trailer:

Sand

Enough sand! I'm itching just looking at it. It's not like degus are flocking to the flicks to watch movies for their sand-content. Dessert, wasteland, or whatever, it doesn't matter - tarmac's never looked so good.

Tom Hardy

That's all.

Charlize Theron

Even in a film with a gruff Tom Hardy, the Oscar-winning actress pulls out a performance that shows that she is large and in charge. No-one will mess with her. No-one should dare.

Enough opera

The opera, all the opera. It's amazing how opera survived the apocalypse, isn't it? Cockroaches, sand and opera - that's what we've all got to look forward to.

No Mel Gibson

This is A Good Thing.
